title: Sapphire
description: A blue corundum gemstone, known for its beauty and durability.

title: Ruby
description: A red corundum gemstone, valued for its intense color.

title: Emerald
description: A green beryl gemstone, prized for its deep color.

title: Kyanite
description: An aluminum silicate mineral, known for its trichroism and hardness.

title: Obsidian
description: A volcanic glass, known for its dark color and glassy luster.

title: Amethyst
description: A purple quartz gemstone, valued for its calming properties.

title: Quartz
description: A common mineral, often colorless but can come in various colors, including yellow.

title: Topaz
description: A silicate mineral gemstone, available in various colors.

title: Opal
description: A hydrated amorphous form of silica, known for its play of color.

title: Peridot
description: A green silicate mineral gemstone, known for its vibrant color.
